attributes.action: Children who fast in Ramadan should be allowed to have shorter school days
attributes.additional_details: Because it will make Ramadan easier for children who are fasting at school
attributes.background: To make Ramadan easier for children by allowing us to have shorter school days during the month of Ramadan

rejection.details:
The decisions to grant leave or absences is a matter for individual schools and not that of the Government or Parliament 

You might like to sign the below petition we currently have open on a similar topic: 

Make the period of Ramadan a school holiday
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612422
